events.event: Larry Page and Sergey Brin begin Stanford research project (BackRub search engine)
Google Inc. founded - early funding includes CIA/NSA-connected venture capital
Google IPO - becomes publicly traded company
Acquires Keyhole Inc. (In-Q-Tel/CIA portfolio company) - becomes Google Earth
Gmail launched - email content scanning for advertising (surveillance potential)
Android Inc. acquired - becomes dominant mobile OS
NSA PRISM program begins - direct server access to user data (revealed 2013)
Snowden revelations expose NSA PRISM access to Google servers - Google denies knowledge
Alphabet Inc. restructuring - creates holding company for various projects
Project Maven: Pentagon AI contract for drone targeting - employee discovery and protests
Project Maven canceled after 4,000+ employee petition and resignations
YouTube content moderation increases - coordination with government on 'misinformation'
COVID-19 'misinformation' censorship - removal of vaccine skepticism, lab leak theory
Google Cloud expansion into government and intelligence community contracts
